alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 10 at 8:45PM EST until January 14 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Stillwater Creek At Uhrichsville affecting Tuscarawas County. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Stillwater Creek at Uhrichsville. * WHEN...From late Friday night to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Stillwater Creek comes out of its banks in several locations resulting in overflowing in poor drainage areas. Minor flooding of low lying areas begins. At 11.5 feet, Flood waters of Stillwater Creek will reach the intersection of East 12th Street and North Main Street in Uhrichsville and approach Newport Street. Little Stillwater Creek will flood most of Phac Park along with portions of Wilson Road in Dennison. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/pbz.
